data.title: 590+ Unique & Cool Baby Girl Names And Their Meanings
data.meta_description: Looking for cool baby girl names that you haven‚Äôt seen anywhere else? Find the perfect fit by reviewing our list of unique girl names from around the world.
data.text:
Looking for unique and cool baby girl names that you haven‚Äôt seen anywhere else?

Find the perfect fit by reviewing our list of creative girl names from around the world.

Handpicking a name for your baby girl is a great honor of parenthood.

Of all the names in the world, you get to choose one that‚Äôs beautiful to you ‚Äî and may even carry a familial, cultural, or other special meaning.

Luckily, there are plenty of unique girl names to choose from.

In our collection of 591 cool baby girl names, you‚Äôll find unusual girl names that you won‚Äôt see anywhere else, from boho to edgy.

Our list includes the meaning of each name, so you know the significance behind it.

So let‚Äôs find some super-cool girl names!

In this article: üìù

Cool Baby Girl Names

Ariel: Lion of God.

Violet: Purple flower.

Lena: Light, or ray of light.

Emaline: Peaceful home.

Brielle: Heroine of God.

Vera: True, faith.

Hawaii: New homeland.

Liliana: Pure, innocent, lily.

Chloe: Blooming, fertility.

Marlene: Star of the sea.

Gabrielle: God is my strength.

Adelaide: Noble-natured.

Mirabel: Wondrous.

Danica: Morning star.

Myla: Merciful, soldier.

Trista: Noisy.

Ruby: Red precious stone.

Yuka: Reason, fragrance, good.

Jobelle: Yahweh is gracious.

Ausha: Energetic, determined, courageous.

Vienna: Wine country.

Brynne: Noble, defender, drop of water.

McKay: Happy, rejoicing.

Halle: Home ruler.

Jewel: Delight, plaything.

Mari: Beloved.

Julane: Pretty, Yahweh is God.

Octavia: Eighth.

Briar: Brambles, thorny bush of wild roses.

Bella: Beautiful.

Nadia: Hope.

What are creative cool girl names?

If you‚Äôre on the hunt for awesome girl names that you won‚Äôt find other places, check out these baby girl names and their meanings.

Mia: Beloved, darling.

Luna: Moon.

Cora: Just, honest, virtuous.

Evelyn: Wished-for child.

Yolanda: Violet.

Laina: Pathway.

Eva: Life, living one.

Phoebe: Bright.

Irie: Good, pleasing.

Kiera: Dark, dark-haired.

Wren: Small bird.

Daphne: Fountains, springs, brooks.

Tessa: Fourth, reaper.

Phoenix: Dark red.

Aspen: Quaking tree.

Faith: Trust, belief.

Fiona: Fair, white.

Leia: Child of heaven.

Raquel: Innocent.

Astrid: Beautiful, fair.

Heidi: Nobility.

Janece: Benevolent, brilliant.

Rowan: Little red-haired one.

Joelle: Jehovah is God.

Elsa: Pledged for God.

Delanie: From the alder grove.

Winnie: Fair one, smooth, soft.

Scarlett: Courage, passion.

Harlow: Army hill.

Robyn: Bright, famous one.

Selena: Moon goddess.

Elle: She.

Quinn: Counsel.

Chaya: Life.

What is a unique girl name?

Akari, Calla, Citra, Inara, Loxley, Lyric, and Sunniva all make our list of unique names ‚Äî and many more besides.

The most important part of naming your baby is that you get to decide on a name that resonates with you.

That makes you go, ‚ÄúAhhh, that feels right.‚Äù

That might be an unusual name, or it might be a more well-known name.

What matters is that it feels right to you for your baby.

Piper: Feisty yet floaty.

Iris: Rainbow.

Tobi: God is good.

Alexa: To defend.

Kyra: Lord.

Asantewaa: Warrior.

Petra: Rock, stone.

Cinnamon: Spice.

Paris: Wallet, pouch.

Raelyn: Advisor, protector.

Daisy: Day‚Äôs eye.

Dominique: Of the Lord.

Lara: Protection.

Hope: Desire of fulfillment.

Arianne: Most holy.

Opal: Jewel.

Fallon: Leader.

Anastasia: Resurrection.

Clea: To praise.

Kehlani: Sea and sky.

Emersyn: Powerful, brave.

Mercedes: Reward.

Olive: Olive tree.

Marley: Pleasant seaside meadow.

Estelle: Star.

Kamila: Perfect.

Austin: Great, magnificent.

Jade: Stone of the side.

Serena: Tranquil, serene, clear.

Tena: Strong, healthy.

Melody: Song.

Tania: Fairy queen.

What are uncommon cool girl names?

Looking for unusual girl names?

Here are pretty unique girl names that you won‚Äôt come across very often ‚Äî if ever.

Adina: Gentle, mild.

Skylar: Eternal life, strength.

Fern: Green plant.

Serenity: Peaceful.

Raya: Friend.

Juniper: Young.

Carolina: Freeholder, song of happiness.

River: Water that flows to sea.

Sunny: Cheerful, happy.

Josilyn: Member of a German tribe.

Myka: Who resembles God?

Perla: Pearl.

Logan: Little hollow.

Christa: Chosen one, anointed.

Josie: God will increase.

Clementine: Merciful.

Ilse: Oath of God.

Wendy: Friend.

Georgia: Farmer.

Sienna: Orange-red.

Catalina: Pure.

Akia: First-born.

Teagan: Beautiful, perfect.

Jasmine: Gift from God.

Allegra: Joyful.

Holly: To prick, domestic happiness.

Tallulah: Leaping water.

Ayden: Fire.

Magnolia: Flower.

Amalie: Hope, water.

Giada: Jade.

What is an edgy name for a girl?

For a name that‚Äôll stand out and have extra meaning, try one of these really cool girl names.

You‚Äôll be dreaming of the moment you can sign her birth certificate.

Lily: White flower.

Willow: Freedom, willow tree.

Shivani: Life and death.

Naomi: Pleasant, beautiful.

Kinsley: King‚Äôs meadow.

Aaliyah: High, exalted.

Sejal: Pure flowing water.

Millicent: Strength.

Rochelle: Little rock, rest.

Marina: From the sea.

Beatrix: Voyager, traveler.

Zoey: Life

Maeve: Intoxicating one.

Ilana: Tree.

Natalia: Christmas day.

Leah: Pretty girl.

Brooke: Small stream, water.

Summer: Season.

Trinity: Triad, referring to the Holy Trinity.

Rasha: Pleasant.

Aurelia: Golden one.

Sabrina: From the River Severn.

Genevieve: Woman of the race.

Azalea: Dry.

Callie: Beauty.

Avery: Wise.

Cecilla: Blind.

Alexis: Helper.

Adele: Noble.

Morgan: Sea-born.

Kindra: Greatest champion.

Diedre: Broken-hearted, sorrowful.

Stella: Star.

Rae: Ewe or ray of light.

Isla: Island.

Lilac: Bluish, lilac.

Maisie: Pearl or bitter.

Savannah: Treeless plain.

Taylor: Any Swifties about?

Dakota: Friend, allies.

Polly: Star of the sea.

Sonya: Wisdom.

What are some badass girl names?

The most badass girl names include Aspen, Jade, and River.

These names symbolize a tough, clever, and resilient female.

With one of these cool names for girls, your little gal will be ready to wow the world.

What is the rarest girl name?

One of the rarest girl names is Elora, because it‚Äôs low on the popularity charts, but there are several rare girl names including Hadleigh and Ophelia.

Some parents even decide to create an entirely new name based on a place they love, a family member, or one with other cultural significance.

What are the 10 rarest girl names?

It‚Äôs kinda tough to know what the rarest names in the world are ‚Äî if we knew that, they wouldn‚Äôt be so rare!

What counts as rare also changes from culture to culture.

While certain Arabic, Sanskrit, or African names might be fairly unique in the United States, they could be common in Jordan, India, or Ghana.

These are some of our favorite unique girl names with meaning.

If your favorite name isn‚Äôt listed here, keep reading ‚Äî there are plenty more below.

Cosima: From the Greek, Cosima means ‚Äúorder‚Äù and ‚Äúdecency.‚Äù It‚Äôs a feminine version of the name Cosimo.

Delphi: Another name with Greek origins, Delphi refers to the ancient city of Delphi and the famous oracle that called it home.

Elowen: A Cornish name (from Cornwall, in southwest England), Elowen means ‚Äúelm.‚Äù

Izara: Izara is a name with African roots. It means ‚Äúshawl,‚Äù ‚Äústar,‚Äù or ‚Äúa section of a tree.‚Äù

Lyric: Of Greek or French origin, Lyric, as you might imagine, relates to music. It means ‚Äúsonglike‚Äù or ‚Äúlyre.‚Äù

Kalilah: Kalilah is an Arabic name that means ‚Äúdarling‚Äù or ‚Äúbeloved.‚Äù

Prairie: A French name, Prairie means ‚Äúmeadow‚Äù or ‚Äúgrassland.‚Äù The Canadian Prairies refer to a large area in western Canada home to grasslands and plains.

Romilly: Romilly is a gender-neutral name that means ‚Äúa citizen of Rome.‚Äù

Snow: Are you having a winter baby? Snow is an English name that can refer to snow or mean ‚Äúlight-haired.‚Äù

Sunniva: This Anglo-Saxon name means ‚Äúgift of the sun.‚Äù

What are short unique girl names?

Looking for something short and snappy?

Maybe your baby‚Äôs name is waiting for you on our list of one-syllable unique baby girl names below.

(And if you‚Äôre looking for more? Our list of 250 one-syllable names has you covered.

Bao: A sweet name after the delicious Chinese dim sum, Bao means ‚Äúprecious treasure‚Äù.

Bo: A gender-neutral name meaning ‚Äúto live‚Äù.

Bray: Another gender-neutral name meaning ‚Äúbricklayer‚Äù.

Fay: An English girl‚Äôs name meaning ‚Äúfairy‚Äù, also spelled Faye.

Fleur: A French name meaning ‚Äúflower‚Äù.

Flyn: A unisex option meaning ‚Äúchild of the red-haired one‚Äù in Irish.

Jai: Meaning ‚Äúbluebird‚Äù in Indian.

Jett: A more gothic girl‚Äôs name meaning ‚Äúblack‚Äù.

Kai: A name with lots of origins (Scandinavian, Japanese, and Hawaiian, to name a few!), the most commonly accepted meaning is ‚Äúsea‚Äù.

Noam: A Hebrew girl‚Äôs name meaning ‚Äúbeautiful‚Äù.

More cool, unique girl names

The remaining options on our list are some of the prettiest unique girl names you‚Äôre likely to find.

Which one speaks to you?

What is the coolest girl name ever?

The coolest girl name ever is Naomi because it means beautiful, pleasant, and ‚Äúabove all‚Äù.

Other cool baby girl names include Ruby, Phoenix, and Luna, although there are hundreds of awesome girl names to choose from.

The unique and cool name you decide for your girl is what matters most.

Choose a name you love, find meaning in it, and get excited to share the news with your family and friends.
